app.revision_history: changed fs_top_lib to fileset_top_lib in projutils
app.name: projutils
app.summary: This is a collection of scripts and utility application that are grouped by relevance to manipulation of projects.

proc.name: convert_ngc
proc.summary: Convert all provided NGC files to a supported format

proc.name: export_bd_synth
proc.summary: Create and write a single design checkpoint and stub files for a Block Design (BD), for use with third party synthesis tools. Perform synthesis as necessary.

proc.name: export_ip_user_files
proc.summary: Generate and export IP/IPI user files from a project. This can be scoped to work on one or more IPs.

proc.name: export_simulation
proc.summary: Export a script and associated data files (if any) for driving standalone simulation using the specified simulator.

proc.name: setup_ip_static_library
proc.summary: Extract static files from the IPs for prepare it for compile_simlib Tcl command

proc.name: write_project_tcl
proc.summary: Export Tcl script for re-creating the current project
